General.Name: United Plantations Bhd
General.Description: United Plantations Berhad engages in the cultivation and processing of oil palm and coconut in Malaysia, Indonesia, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Plantations, Palm Oil Refining, and Other. It offers edible oils, fats, and cocoa butter substitutes; and trades in crude palm oil and palm kernel products. The company also handles and stores vegetable oil and molasses; and provides trading and marketing services. United Plantations Berhad was founded in 1906 and is based in Teluk Intan, Malaysia.
